title: Funny Prime Factorization
text:
You will given an integer number N. Find the prime factors of this number.InputThe input consists of several lines.Each line consists of one integer N (2 ≤ N ≤ 107)OutputIn each line you need to print the factors of N separated by " x ".ExampleInput:2
8
6Output:2 = 2
8 = 2 x 2 x 2
6 = 2 x 3
